title: Monitor CCTV for Suspicious Activity
description: A security operator watching the CCTV monitors notices an individual leaving a backpack unattended in a high-traffic area.

tasks.description: Identify the location of the unattended bag on the CCTV feed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent notes the location (e.g., near the main escalator).

tasks.description: Continue to monitor the bag and the surrounding area for the owner to return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent observes the bag for several minutes, and no one returns.

tasks.description: Dispatch a security guard to the location to investigate the package.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a guard to the location.

tasks.description: If the package is deemed suspicious, the on-site guard will escalate to the bomb squad or local police as per protocol.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the incident and stands by to assist with further emergency protocols if needed.
